review: Does everything I expected it to do.  When I first started looking into a Chromecast vs some of the other products that could stream Netflix, Hulu, etc I wasn't sure if this was the right option compared to a stand alone item like an Roku.  But I am very happy with this product.  The price was the big selling point for me... with the Chromecast I was able to get an inexpensive product that allowed me to view my streaming services along with anything I can vie win Google Chrome.  Would definitely recommend
